    • Field Detail

      • LIST_VIEW

        public static final java.lang.String LIST_VIEW

        constant indocator for List View

        Description:

        All the events in the calendar are displayed chronologically.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • MONTH_VIEW

        public static final java.lang.String MONTH_VIEW

        constant indicator for Month View

        Description:

        The current month is displayed with all the events listed under that month.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • YEAR_VIEW

        public static final java.lang.String YEAR_VIEW

        constant indicator for Year View

        Description:

        Events are displayed as a small table(year) view with events listing for the selected month.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Constructor Detail

      • CalendarSettings

        public CalendarSettings(java.lang.String siteId,
                        java.lang.String instanceId)
        Construct settings and initialize fields with default values. It's important to initialize ALL fields, because module instance may not have configuration defined in DB. In this case it must use default settings.
        Parameters:
        siteId - String Site identifier (a.k.a. Site Key)
        instanceId - String Instance Name (default, political, etc)
